General.Name: Aqua Bio Technology ASA
General.Description: Aqua Bio Technology ASA engages in the manufacture and sale of ingredients for cosmetic industry in Norway. It offers Aquabeautine XL, a proprietary ingredient for skincare products; and Spirulysat, an antioxidant and vitamin-boosted spirulina for cosmetic use. The company distributes its products through Internet, stores, and skincare clinics. Aqua Bio Technology ASA was founded in 2000 and is based in Lysaker, Norway.
